name: tiy-starter-kit
description: a lightweight build system for transpiling js & scss, browserifying and running a simple node server. auto-installs backbone and react

scripts.start: npm run stop && npm run watch
scripts.watch: npm run watch-js && npm run watch-css && npm run display-start-msg&
scripts.display-start-msg:
echo '

===== watching js and scss files in src/, writing changes to public/ =====

'

author: magentanova
